Super Sea Lion

Super Sea Lion

A 2D Web Game Made for CS537 Software Engineering

Press Q to jump, E to fire

Screenshots

.

.

Features

This game runs on mobile safari. the animation is very cute. It is a very good demo of skeleton animations. Press tab you can switch into map editing mode. Click on the screen to add enimies. Press space to change enemy type. Press p to download enemy file.

Credits

Lead Developer:Yinchu Xia

Animation Developer:Yuanlin Xu

AI Developer:Mark Sargent

Level Developer:Chootiraka Niraporn
